snippet.title: Torchlight Frontiers | Forged Class Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Things are heating up in Torchlight Frontiers with the introduction of the latest combat trailer for one of the game’s all-new hero classes: The Forged. This awesome automaton uses its arsenal of weaponry to build up heat before unleashing a devastating explosive attack on its enemies! Check out the trailer to see this mechanical marvel in action!

Sign up for updates, exclusive content, beta tests, and more at https://www.TorchlightFrontiers.com 

Torchlight Frontiers will be available on PC, Xbox One and PlayStation®4. 

Like: https://www.facebook.com/PlayTorchlight 
Follow: https://twitter.com/PlayTorchlight 
Watch: https://www.twitch.tv/PlayTorchlight
